entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Tuesday 21 March 2023
